conversations.query: What Happens When We Select Reports Option from Leave Option and select My Leave Entitlements and usage Report,Select all fields from it & Click on Generate Button

conversations.BDD: [Launch Application,Login into Website,Navigate to Leave option,Select Reports Option, Click on Dropdown,Select My Leave Entitlements & usage Report,Select Leave Period,Click on Generate Button,Close Browser]

conversations.query: What happens when we select configure option from Leave Option and select Leave Period option, Select all fields from it and then Click on Save Button

conversations.BDD: [Launch Application,Login into Website,Navigate to Leave option,Select Configure Option,Click on Dropdown,Select Leave Period,Select Start Month,Select Start Date,Enter End Date,Enter Current leave period,Click on save Button,Close Browser]

conversations.query: What happens when we click on Configure option from Leave option,Select Leave Types option,Select all fields from it and Click on Save Button

conversations.BDD: [Launch Application,Login into Website,Navigate to Leave option,Select Configure Option,Click on Dropdown,Select Leave Type,Enter Name,Select Is Entitlement Situational?,Click on save Button,Close Browser]

conversations.query: What happens when we click on Configure option from Leave option,Select Work Week option,Select all fields from it and Click on Save Button

conversations.BDD: [Launch Application,Login into Website,Navigate to Leave option,Select Configure Option,Click on Dropdown,Select Work Week,Select Monday,Click on dropdown,Select Full Day,Repeat upto Friday,Select Saturday and Sunday as Non-working day, Click on save Button,Close Browser]

conversations.query: What happens when we click on Configure option from Leave option,Select Holidays option,Select all fields from it and Click on Save Button

conversations.BDD: [Launch Application,Login into Website,Navigate to Leave option,Select Configure Option,Click on Dropdown,Select Holidays,Select Monday,Click on dropdown,Select Date 'From',Select Date 'To', Click on save Button,Close Browser]
